subject: Soccer
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Goalkeepers Hope Solo and Briana Scurry, who were at the center of a World Cup controversy, were invited to the United States women’s national team training camp by the new coach, Pia Sundhage. The camp will mark the beginning of the run to the 2008 Olympics in Beijing.
